item.title: Realm of Sand
item.description: Overview Players take it in turns to place squares on their boards in the form of (polyomino) Rune Tiles that they discard from their hands. They then use the shapes they have created with these squares to complete buildings from a central pool. Buildings offer bonuses in game, and points at the end of the game in the form of stars. Building cards also include hourglass icons that dictate the end of the game.
